enhancedcelestials.commands.failed.requi: 將時間設定為黃昏或夜晚（白天的時間值在 12000 到 24000 之間）以便使用此命令。目前時間是 %s
enhancedcelestials.commands.success.harv: 設定月象事件為 "豐收之月"
enhancedcelestials.notification.blood_mo: 注意: "血月" 正在升起...
注意: "血月" 正在落下...
enhancedcelestials.notification.harvest_: 注意: "豐收之月" 正在升起...
注意: "豐收之月" 正在落下...
enhancedcelestials.sleep.fail.blood_moon: 你現在無法休息，目前的月相事件是 "血月"。
enhancedcelestials.commands.disabled: Enhanced Celestials' lunar events are disabled for this world!
enhancedcelestials.commands.lunarevent_m: "%s" is not a valid lunar event!
enhancedcelestials.notification.blue_moo: The "Blue Moon" rises... You feel lucky!
The "Blue Moon" sets... You don't feel lucky anymore...
enhancedcelestials.notification.super_bl: The "Super Blood Moon" rises... Distant sounds of the undead can be heard...
The "Super Blood Moon" sets... The undead begin to burn...
The "Super Blue Moon" rises... You feel very lucky!
The "Super Blue Moon" sets... You don't feel very lucky anymore...
enhancedcelestials.notification.super_ha: The "Super Harvest Moon" rises... Your crops provide an exceptional harvest.
enhancedcelestials.sleep.fail: 你現在不能休息, 目前月相為 "血月"
